newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Excel Communications as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Excel Communications as buy.

text.p: -- Chicago Corp analyst Eric Strumingher said he initiated coverage of long-distance telephone reseller Excel Communications Inc with a buy rating and a 12-month price target of $31. The company had its initial public offering in May 1996.
-- He forecast 1996 earnings per share of $1.53 and 1997 EPS of $2.21.
-- Strumingher said the company's superior sales channel and prudent investment in back-office support assured rapid growth.
-- The stock was up 1-3/4 at 22-5/8 at 1200 EDT/1600 GMT.
